Is your software ready for quick recovery?

Software escrow should secure your assets, not complicate them. Traditional methods are fraught with issues that can hinder your progress.

Software escrow can be hard to implement, especially when dealing with many vendors.

Do these hurdles sound familiar?

Manual Hassles:

Time-consuming manual deposits and protracted processing times slow down your development cycle.

Complex Procedures:

Navigating the maze of traditional escrow deposit procedures can leave developers frustrated.

Legal Labyrinths:

The intricate legalities of conventional escrow services often inflate costs with lawyer-driven red tape.

Recovery Delays:

In the fast-paced digital era, old-school escrow services falter, leaving you with outdated backups and missing critical deployment data.

Team Strain:

Without specialized support, efficiently redeploying your software becomes a stressful and uncertain process.

Move beyond these outdated practices with a modern escrow solution designed for today's agile businesses.

Everything is still manual?

Traditional escrows require expensive manual deposits at extra costs, and they take long to process.

Manual deposits in traditional escrow can be unnecessarily time-consuming for developers.

Developers often face complex and confusing deposit procedures.

The legal complexities of traditional escrow can lead to expensive lawyer-driven processes.

Uncertainty about reliable and fast recovery?

Old school escrow solutions aren’t prepared for the requirements of the real-time digital cloud era.

With traditional escrow, developers can end up with outdated and incomplete deposit versions

Traditional escrow often lacks crucial deployment configuration information.

Without a dedicated team, quick redeployment can be a challenge in traditional escrow scenarios.

Our state-of-the-art software escrow service integrates effortlessly with your development tools, ensuring your assets are always up-to-date, secure, and ready for recovery when you need them most

With a dedicated team focussed on software escrow, we provide a seamless and automated safety net, allowing you to focus on what you do best.

Your mission critical software assets should never have to be at risk.

These companies already secured their software continuity. Will you start today?

Deployment Assets

Build and deployment configuration scripts, and entire virtual machine images ready to deploy can be deposited.

Deposit all kinds of intellectual property and other critical digital material. Automatically time-stamped to prove ownership.

Technology & Designs

Use escrow to protect your unique intellectual property.

Access Credentials

One of the most important aspects in getting back up and running. Deposit credentials with ease.

Frequently Asked Questions

  • What is automated software escrow, and how does it benefit me?

  • Automated software escrow is a state-of-the-art solution that securely stores your software assets, ensuring they are ready for quick recovery. Integrated with all developer tools, it simplifies the escrow process for developers while providing peace of mind for clients, eliminating manual hassles and complex procedures.

  • How does Codekeeper's software escrow differ from traditional escrow services?

  • Unlike traditional escrow services fraught with manual deposits, complex procedures, and legal red tape, Codekeeper's automated software escrow is designed for today's agile businesses. It offers a streamlined, fully automated process that integrates seamlessly with developer tools, ensuring quick, easy, and secure asset storage and recovery.

  • Can Codekeeper's software escrow handle multiple vendors?

  • Yes, Codekeeper's software escrow solution is built to efficiently manage assets across multiple vendors, simplifying the escrow process even in complex multi-vendor environments and ensuring all your critical software assets are securely stored and easily recoverable.

  • What kind of support does Codekeeper offer for software recovery?

  • Codekeeper offers comprehensive support for software recovery, including full recovery support, payment guarantees, and a variety of verification options to ensure that your software can be quickly and efficiently redeployed whenever necessary.

  • Is Codekeeper's software escrow solution easy to implement?

  • Absolutely. Our software escrow solution is designed to be user-friendly and easy to implement, with a fully automated process that reduces the time and effort typically required for escrowmanagement. Developers and software clients can easily register and start the implementation process, ensuring their assets are protected without delay.

  • How does software escrow protect my business operations?

  • Software escrow safeguards your business operations by ensuring that your critical software assets, including source code and application data, are securely stored and readily available for recovery. This uninterrupted access to essential software assets means your operations can continue smoothly, even in unforeseen circumstances.

  • What assets can I protect with Codekeeper's software escrow?

  • With Codekeeper's software escrow, you can protect a wide range of software assets, including source code, application data, and any other critical software components necessary for the operation of your business, ensuring they're ready for quick recovery when needed.

  • Who should consider using software escrow?

  • Software escrow is essential for any business that relies on software for its operations, especially those that use custom or critical software applications. It's particularly crucial for businesses seeking to mitigate risks associated with software vendor failures or disputes.

  • How does software escrow contribute to legal compliance and security?

  • Software escrow contributes to legal compliance and security by providing a solid legal framework that safeguards intellectual property rights and ensures access to critical software assets under agreed-upon conditions. This legal assurance protects both software developers and clients, aligning with regulatory requirements and security best practices.

  • How can I get started with Codekeeper's software escrow service?

  • Getting started with Codekeeper's software escrow service is straightforward. Simply register on our platform and start your implementation process today. Our team is ready to assist you with any queries or support you may need to ensure a smooth and efficient setup.

    • Show more questions + Show less questions -

Codekeeper Pricing Philosophy

Software escrow is comparable to your home insurance:
It's better to have it and not need it than need it and not have it.

We use the latest developments in technology and automation services to offer you the best industry-related prices, guaranteed.

Frequently Asked Questions

  • What payment methods do you support?

  • We support all major credit cards. As subscriptions are processed using Chargebee and payments are processed using Stripe, you may see these names appear on your credit card statement.

  • Can I change my payment method after signing up?

  • Yes, you can update your payment method at any time. To do so, log in to your Codekeeper account, navigate to the Billing section, and update your payment information. If you need assistance, please contact our customer support team.

  • Do you support pay-by-invoice?

  • Yes, we do. You can simply send us an email at service@codekeeper.co and request that your account be set to pay-by-invoice.

  • What pricing plans do you offer? Are there any setup fees for using Codekeeper's escrow services?

  • You can find information on our pricing plans and setup fees on the page above. If you have any questions that are not answered on this page you can get in touch with us by sending an email to contact@codekeeper.co.

  • How does the billing cycle work?

  • Billing cycles are based on the date you sign up for a plan. Monthly plans will be billed every month on the same date, while annual plans will be billed once a year.

  • Are there any additional fees for adding more users to my account?

  • As long as the users are team members and not escrow counterparties, there are no additional costs involved.

  • How secure is my payment information?

  • We take security very seriously and use industry-standard encryption and security measures to protect your payment information. Your credit card details are never stored on our servers and are securely processed by our payment processor.

  • Is there a discount for annual billing?

  • Yes, we offer a discount for customers who choose to pay annually. The discounted rate for each plan can be found on our pricing page. By selecting annual billing, you can enjoy a lower overall cost compared to monthly billing.

  • Can I get a custom plan if my requirements don't fit any of the listed plans?

  • We understand that every organization's needs are unique. If your requirements don't fit within our standard pricing plans, please contact our sales team at sales@codekeeper.co to discuss a custom solution tailored to your specific needs.

  • Are there any fees for depositing or updating source code?

  • No, there are no fees for depositing or updating source code within the limits specified by your chosen plan. If your needs exceed these limits, please contact our sales team to discuss upgrading your plan or creating a custom solution.

  • How do I know which pricing plan is right for my organization?

  • Our pricing plans are designed to accommodate various types and sizes of organizations.

  • Will I get a VAT invoice?

  • Yes. If you enter your VAT information during sign-up, you'll receive an invoice specifying the VAT amounts. All listed prices of Codekeeper services do not include VAT.

  • Can I change my plan after signing up?

  • You can make changes to your plan at any time. Please note that we do not offer refunds for downgrades. To change your plan, just send us an email with your new requirements; we will validate the necessary configuration and send you a custom offer to ensure you’re only ever paying for what you really need.

  • Can I get a refund if I cancel after signing up?

  • No. We do not offer refunds unless there is an extenuating circumstance.

  • How do I contact you if I have questions before signing up?

  • We would love to show you around our platform and answer any of your questions. You can schedule a 30-minute demo call with one of our specialists here.

    • Show more questions + Show less questions -
